data.name: 1428: Shadows over Silesia Demo
data.supported_languages:
English*, Czech*, Spanish - Latin America, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Windows 8 (8.1) or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-3220
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660, AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400/AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1060, AMD GPU Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative SOUND BLASTER Zx

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

highlighted.name: I don't do it for money

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes stylized nudity, rude speech, violence, sexual violence and alcohol.
